summary: Action required: update cluster proxy configuration
description: The clusterwide openshift proxy is misconfigured, generating alerts to Red Hat SRE. Please review it to restore the cluster's operation. See documentation: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/networking/configuring-a-cluster-wide-proxy#configuring-a-proxy-after-installation_configuring-a-cluster-wide-proxy.
